properties.areaDesc: Waters from Port Mansfield TX to the Rio Grande River from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from Baffin Bay to Port Mansfield TX from 20 to 60 NM; Coastal waters from Baffin Bay to Port Mansfield TX out 20 NM; Coastal waters from Port Mansfield TX to the Rio Grande River out 20 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 20 at 12:15PM CST until February 20 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Brownsville TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, north winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts
up to 40 kt and seas building to 6 to 12 feet. For the Small
Craft Advisory, north winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt
and seas building 5 to 10 feet.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Port Mansfield to the Rio Grande
out 20 nm, Coastal waters from Baffin Bay to Port Mansfield
out 20 nm, Waters from Port Mansfield to the Rio Grande
extending from 20 to 60 nm and Waters from Baffin Bay to Port
Mansfield extending from 20 to 60 nm.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 3 PM this afternoon to 9 AM
CST Friday. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 9 AM this
morning to 3 PM CST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...A Gale Warning means winds of 34 to 47 knots are
imminent or occurring. Operating a vessel in gale conditions
requires experience and properly equipped vessels. It is
highly recommended that mariners without the proper experience
seek safe harbor prior to the onset of gale conditions.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Hazardous marine conditions will likely
continue through Friday with possible additional issuance of
Small Craft Advisories.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... ...GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST FRIDAY
